name: Ivan ALLEN, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Allen v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Ivan ALLEN, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
48 A.3d 1244
Ivan ALLEN, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.
No. 81 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 19, 2012.
